title: Israel opposed the Iran nuclear deal, but former Israeli officials increasingly say U.S. pullout was a mistake
content:
1. Israel opposed the Iran nuclear deal, but former Israeli officials increasingly say U.S. pullout was a mistake  The Washington Post
  2. Israel Must Change Its Strategy to Iran and the JCPOA  Bloomberg
  3. Iran nuclear talks won't — and can't — succeed  Yahoo News
  4. The U.S. Shouldn't Give up Too Soon on Iran Nuclear Talks | Opinion  Newsweek
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: イスラエルはイラン核合意に反対していたが、イスラエルの元政府高官は米国の撤退は間違いだったと言うようになった
